question: Which one of the following would have happened if the Himalayan Range did not exist?
option1: North western part of India would have experienced humid condition
option2: Coastal region of India would have experienced Mediterranean climate
option3: North Indian plain would have been much cooler in winter season
option4: Monsoon rains would have taken place in winter months
answer: North Indian plain would have been much cooler in winter season
explanation: North Indian plain would have been much cooler in the winter season if the Himalayan Range did not exist.
